mapper.select: SELECT a.name as name, a.surname as surname, a.birthdate as birthdate, a.gender as gender, b.name as nameSubcategory, c.name as nameCategory FROM user a, category b, subcategory c, profile d, profile_subcategory e WHERE a.name= #{nameUser} and a.surname= #{surnameUser} and a.user_id=d.user_id and d.profile_id=e.profile_id and c.subcategory_id=e.subcategory_id and c.category_id= b.category_id
